Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.jaxrs.api

Interface JaxRsAsyncHalResponseRenderer

@ProviderType public interface JaxRsAsyncHalResponseRenderer
A service that asynchronously renders a LinkableResource to a JAX-RS AsyncResponse, and handles any errors that happen during rendering

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    respondWith(io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource resourceImpl, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo, javax.ws.rs.container.AsyncResponse suspended, io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.common.RequestMetricsCollector metrics)
     
    void
    respondWithError(Throwable ex, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo, javax.ws.rs.container.AsyncResponse suspended, io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.common.RequestMetricsCollector metrics)
    Render a response for an exception that was caught before a LinkableResource was created

  • Method Details

    • respondWith

      void respondWith(io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource resourceImpl, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo, javax.ws.rs.container.AsyncResponse suspended, io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.common.RequestMetricsCollector metrics)
      Parameters:
      resourceImpl - the resource to be rendered
      uriInfo - information about the URI of the incoming request
      suspended - the JAX-RS response to be resumed
      metrics - collects information about all upstream requests executed during the current request

    • respondWithError

      void respondWithError(Throwable ex, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo, javax.ws.rs.container.AsyncResponse suspended, io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.common.RequestMetricsCollector metrics)
      Render a response for an exception that was caught before a LinkableResource was created
      Parameters:

      uriInfo - information about the URI of the incoming request
